comment: A solid tribute to your scotch shelf. Already infused with the unique copper fox smoke. Not much more needed.

Nose: fresh burnt wood, fruity sweetness 

Palate: Medium to full body, slightly drying, sweet sugar, a smooth creamy smoothness on the tongue, flavors of fresh fruit zest, and a salty smokiness
Peach wood gives this whiskey a light floral note, great before dinner whiskey
